last_episode_to_air.name: Legendary Haunts
last_episode_to_air.overview: Visiting a Moundsville, W.Va., prison; Dixmont State Hospital in Pennsylvania.

name: Scariest Places on Earth
overview: Scariest Places on Earth is an American paranormal documentary reality television series that originally aired from October 23, 2000 to October 29, 2006. The program was produced by Triage Entertainment for the Fox Family Channel, which is now ABC Family and owns the rights to the show. The show featured reported cases of the paranormal by sending an ordinary family to visit the location in a reality TV-style vigil.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Visiting a haunted dormitory in Athens, Ohio; the Olson family spends a night in Chillingham Castle; entering a home in Villisca, Iowa, where an axe murderer killed eight people; exploring the site of an exorcism in Haydon Bridge, England.

episodes.name: Eastern State Penitentiary
episodes.overview: A family stays in Philadelphia's Eastern State Penitentiary; visiting the Pine Barrens of New Jersey; exploring the Catacombs of Paris.

episodes.name: Fortress of Blood
episodes.overview: Visiting the Walls of Genoa in Italy; the New London Ledge Lighthouse in New London, Conn.; the Amargosa Opera House and Hotel in Death Valley, Calif.; a mental hospital in New England.

episodes.name: Curse of the Roman Gladiators
episodes.overview: A young American explores a haunted Irish castle; an escaped mental patient known as the "Bunnyman"; a family agrees to spend a night at a haunted plantation.

episodes.name: Village of the Damned
episodes.overview: The Catacombs of Palermo in Italy; Fort Pulaski; the history of a voodoo-cursed plantation.

episodes.name: The White Witch
episodes.overview: "Poltergeist House"; "White Witch of Rose Hall"; "Ohio's Prison of Lost Souls"; "Plantation Dare Part 3."

episodes.name: Magnolia Lane Plantation
episodes.overview: Two families spend the night in a haunted New Orleans plantation.

episodes.name: A House Posessed
episodes.overview: A family returns to a haunted farmhouse; the resting place of Edgar Allan Poe; the ghost of Mary, Queen of Scots, allegedly haunts the Old Bell Inn in Derby, England.

episodes.name: Charleville: Haunted Irish Castle Dare
episodes.overview: The Ulriches attempt to spend a night in Charleville Castle.

episodes.name: Lair of the Wickedest Man on Earth
episodes.overview: Visiting Italy and the lair of an evil genius known as the "wickedest man in the world"; paranormal activity at a Spanish mission; the tragic history of a ghost factory.

episodes.name: Lucedio: Cursed Italian Monastery Dare (The Ordonez Family)
episodes.overview: A Los Angeles family attempts to spend an entire night at a monastery haunted by excommunicated monks and the victims they tortured.

episodes.name: Exorcisms
episodes.overview: "Cemetery of the Angry Undead"; "Poltergeist House"; "Hayden Bridge"; "Living With the Dead."

episodes.name: Oranmore Castle
episodes.overview: Visiting Oranmore Castle in Ireland.

episodes.name: Haunted Voodoo Plantation (The Eaton Family)
episodes.overview: The Eaton family must spend the night rubbing elbows with the ghosts at a tumble-down plantation on the outskirts of New Orleans.

episodes.name: Chillingham (The Olson Family)
episodes.overview: The Olson family enter Chillingham Castle in Northumberland, home to dozens of restless spirits.

episodes.name: Haunting the Heartland
episodes.overview: A Missouri family returns to a haunted farmhouse; an investigator searches for the spirits of a killer and his victims.

episodes.name: Urban Legends
episodes.overview: "Terror on Bunnyman's Bridge"; "Satan's Dormitory"; "The Jersey Devil"; "Blood Red Lighthouse."

episodes.name: Rituals of Evil
episodes.overview: A Voodoo priestess seeks to cleanse evil from a Jamaican plantation; occultist Aleister Crowley founds the Abbey of Thelema in Sicily.

episodes.name: Return to Chillingham (The Lastrapes Family) (2 Hours)
Lost Souls
episodes.overview: A young American explores a haunted Irish castle; brutal events at a reformatory; paranormal activity at a Spanish mission; Italian mummies.

episodes.name: Castle of Cursed Souls (The Ulrich Family)
episodes.overview: Visiting Dalhousie Castle in Midlothian, Scotland.

episodes.name: Island of No Return: The Venice Dare (The Wilson Family) (2 Hours)
episodes.overview: A family from Los Angeles becomes the first people in more than 100 years to spend the night alone on a spooky Italian island.

episodes.name: Return to Chillingham
episodes.overview: A California family explores an ancient castle with a long history of murder, cannibalism and ghostly activity.

episodes.name: Return to Lucedio: The Cursed Italian Monastery Dare Part II (The Hall Family)
episodes.overview: The Hall family accepts the challenge to spend a night in an Italian monastery cursed by mad monks.

episodes.name: Contagaton of Fear: Waverly Hills Sanitarium (Re-Edit)
episodes.overview: A sanatorium reputedly haunted by former patients; a lighthouse on Lake Michigan; an abandoned hotel and bathhouse; a Scottish castle.

episodes.name: Return to Charleville: The Haunted Irish Castle Dare Part II (Benes Family)
episodes.overview: A Los Angeles family hopes to succeed where another family failed -- to spend a night at an Irish castle built by a madman.

episodes.name: Goldfield Ghost Hunt
episodes.overview: Hunting for ghosts in Goldfield, Nev.; the mummies of Mexico; the Hellfire Club; Hot Lake Resort.

episodes.name: A Night in Dracula's Castle: The Transylvania Dare (The Menegaux Family) (2 Hours)
episodes.overview: A family voyages to Transylvania to spend a night in a 14th-century Romanian castle where Vlad the Impaler was reputedly trained as a ruthless warrior.

episodes.name: The Untold Stories (The Wilson Family) (2 Hours)
Return to Romania
episodes.overview: Visiting Bran Castle in Romania.

episodes.name: Woodchester Mansion Dare
episodes.overview: Woodchester mansion in England.

episodes.name: Return to Transylvania
episodes.overview: The Menegaux family of Buffalo, N.Y., spends a night in Hunedoara Castle in Romania, where Vlad the Impaler reputedly trained as a ruthless warrior.

episodes.name: Return to Magnolia Lane (Meyers Family)
episodes.overview: A Houston family spends the night exploring a voodoo-cursed plantation outside of New Orleans.

episodes.name: Castle Transylvania
episodes.overview: The Monahan family visits the home of Vlad the Impaler.

episodes.name: Castle of the Blood Countess
episodes.overview: A family visits Cachtice Castle and encounters the infamous countess who tortured and murdered girls.

episodes.name: Legendary Haunts
episodes.overview: Visiting a Moundsville, W.Va., prison; Dixmont State Hospital in Pennsylvania.

episodes.name: Goldfield Ghost Hunt
episodes.overview: Searching for ghosts in hotel.
